Class Line

  • java.lang.Object
    • kgurushankar.shapes.Shape1D
      • kgurushankar.shapes.Line

  • public class Line
extends Shape1D
    This class represents a line
    Author:
    kgurushankar

    • Field Summary

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Line(float x, float y, double angle, double length)
      Creates a new line with starting point, angle and length that is black with stroke width of 2

      Creates a new line with starting point, angle and length
      Line(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2)
      Creates a new line with endpoints that is black with a stroke width of 2

      Creates a new line with endpoints

      • Line

        public Line(float x1,
            float y1,
            float x2,
            float y2,
            java.awt.Color c,
            double strokeWidth)
        Creates a new line with endpoints
        Parameters:
        x1 - x coordinate of the start of the line
        y1 - y coordinate of the start of the line
        x2 - x coordinate of the end of the line
        y2 - y coordinate of the end of the line
        c - Color of this shape
        strokeWidth - weight of the line this shape will be drawn with
        See Also:
        Line(float, float, float, float)

      • Line

        public Line(float x,
            float y,
            double angle,
            double length,
            java.awt.Color c,
            double strokeWidth)
        Creates a new line with starting point, angle and length
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate of the start of the line
        y - y coordinate of the start of the line
        angle - angle of the line from the starting point (in radians)
        length - length of the line
        c - Color of this shape
        strokeWidth - weight of the line this shape will be drawn with
        See Also:
        Line(float, float, double, double)

        public float[] intersects(Line l2)
        Parameters:
        l2 - the line that is being checked for an intersection
        Returns:
